channel.title: Question Answering on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Question Answering on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.copyright: Â© 2025 AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: GeAR: Generation Augmented Retrieval
item.description: GeAR, a new retrieval model, boosts accuracy by combining document retrieval with fine-grained information generation, leading to better understanding and improved localization.

item.title: MapQaTor: A System for Efficient Annotation of Map Query Datasets
item.description: MAPQATOR: a web app that streamlines creation of reproducible geospatial QA datasets, boosting annotation speed by 30x!

item.title: OmniEval: An Omnidirectional and Automatic RAG Evaluation Benchmark in Financial Domain
item.description: OmniEval: Automatic benchmark for evaluating financial RAG systems.

item.title: RetroLLM: Empowering Large Language Models to Retrieve Fine-grained Evidence within Generation
item.description: RetroLLM unifies retrieval & generation in LLMs, boosting accuracy and cutting costs.

item.title: Comprehensive and Practical Evaluation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation Systems for Medical Question Answering
item.description: MedRGB benchmark reveals current LLMs struggle with noisy medical data, emphasizing the need for robust RAG systems in healthcare AI.

item.title: M-Longdoc: A Benchmark For Multimodal Super-Long Document Understanding And A Retrieval-Aware Tuning Framework
item.description: M-LongDoc: a new benchmark and retrieval-aware tuning framework revolutionizes multimodal long document understanding, improving model accuracy by 4.6%.

item.title: HtmlRAG: HTML is Better Than Plain Text for Modeling Retrieved Knowledge in RAG Systems
item.description: HtmlRAG boosts RAG system accuracy by using HTML, not plain text, to model retrieved knowledge, improving knowledge representation and mitigating LLM hallucination.

item.title: GRS-QA -- Graph Reasoning-Structured Question Answering Dataset
item.description: GRS-QA: New benchmark dataset reveals LLM reasoning limitations!
